title: Curvy and Herpes
text:
I posted this before as "Curvy and Herpes, what more could you want?" but it seemed to invite people to ridicule my situation, so I tries something different in the title. (then it got flagged. If I'm not your thing that's cool, but I'm real and those std sites are not used much ) Same post though as it is still true:

Let's just cut to the chase: Herpes is either a big deal to you, or not.
So if you have educated yourself, you know that it is difficult to pass (2-4% chance from woman to man) but I just need to you be cool with it or have it yourself. I've had it a couple years but never had an outbreak, so it isn't on my radar until I have to have the "talk" with someone and it is just not something I want to have to keep doing. Getting it out in the open is much easier. Okay, on to things that actually matter to those of you who got this far. . .
I'm 50 years old, divorced with grown children. I am looking for love /connection /LTR, BUT we all know that starts with friendship. Age range.. Probably above 35.. I've dated most races(I'm white) and really it's all about being similar enough to relate and different enough to be interesting. I love my life and I'm looking for a connection. While I have my act together, I find I am always learning and growing and finding new things I want to try or learn about. Not daily, but I'm an open-minded person. I don't smoke, but I am cool with 420. Also, I am a curvy girl, so if you really only like slim, petite or athletic, you probably should move on.
OK.. your turn.
If you really need a picture of me right away, send yours. If you just ask me for a picture, I'm going to think you never read to the end of my post and are just a con man (yes, that is what we women run into). Please do tell me a little bit about yourself when you reply.

title: In the mood for dinner, movie or similar?
text:
I would like to see if anyone else feels like a casual, dutch, no strings, no sex, or expectations outside of wishing to not be at home alone, or wherever you would normally be kind of date? If you listen to country music, the song, Take Your Time, but Sam Hunt, is kinda what I am looking for. I just wanna take your time so we can see if we are even compatible, much less friend, or relationship worthy. I am in no rush or hurry. I am not needing anything or anyone. But I am bored, and at times, lonely. It would be nice to have a person of interest to hang out with. If we hang out and have a good time once, and never see each other again, awesome. If we cross paths again as friends, even better. But I only develop deep meaningful friendships and relationships from being friends first and foremost. I'm old enough to know those are the one's who are worthy of your time, passion, and energy. The rest either suck it from you, or you from them, or both. So, friends first. No exceptions.

If you are still interested, I am turning 53 later this month. I am completely happy with who I am, and the choices I make. I could be happier of course, but I am happily content. I have been alone for 7 years or so. I was married in High School, until then. I have spent these past few years working on myself. When you marry as a teen, it kinda just happens that you either under develop, or don't ever develop as a stand alone individual person. So, I have discovered who I am, like me for the most part, and continue to work on what *I* don't like. I used to need a lot of time and attention. I loved fun and happy social events, etc. I am not sure if I actually needed it, as much as I thought I did, but perspective is reality, so I did. 

I am happy alone now. In my solitude and journey, I have discovered the joy of nature, animals, and countless things I barely noticed at all before. I have learned to let go, and get over my egocentric thoughts that I can be the change that someone else has to be for themselves. I am more than over myself now... Well I am sure ego is still there since I would probably do some plastic surgery if I had endless surplus of money, which I do not. However, I always have more than I need, so I am blessed, and grateful. 

If you have read this far in hopes that I am some hot 53 year old yoga instructor or something, well you are going to be sad to hear that I have only attempted yoga in my home 3 times. I am absolutely interested in it, and once I get over my need to look good in the yoga wear first, I might actually go to a class. I love the wisdom and education my years have brought to me. I do not geniunely appreciate the aging process. Although I am commonly told I look younger, and am guessed 10 plus years younger, I feel like my body suddenly got depressed, and sagged and wrinkled like a depressed shar pei puppy or something, lol. I have not ever had the luxury of pampering and worrying about all the things I now wish I had. But alas is life. We are blessed to be old enough to sag and wrinkle... but I probably would still have a little work if I were wealthy. I am human. And sometimes vain. Not often, but sometimes.

I am currently 5'2 and 148lb. I am not a BBW, nor solid muscle. I am what I would call a little soft and pudgy which makes me cringe. But, it is absolutely honest of *my* assessment. I still need to lose 15-20pounds as I am a short lady. But I am hoping to meet some interesting friends here to get me out and active. I do walk 2-4 miles several days a week, but totally inconsistent. I am interested in being more active. I am up for anything like dancing, concerts, hiking, boating, tennis, etc. I just need to have my chill out, down time too. I miss the head on the shoulder, kiss on the neck, the behind you hug, etc. I miss the play and banter. So, I guess it is time to get out there and see if anyone catches my attention, and vice versa. 

If you are interested please take time to do the following. Include who you are, your actual age, and if inclined, a picture. I am not into in really big men, sorry. Some pudge, and extra is fine, I mean no offense. I do not like rude, arrogant people, but no other requirements for religion, political affiliation, race, etc. Just be honest, fair, kind, and fun =). Please tell me why you think you would be a good "date" for me, or vice versa? If I get multiple replies I will contact each one who takes time to reply. I will be picking based on instant attraction, instinct, or curiosity of some sort, etc. I am not looking at a 6'4, 220 lb athlete, with full head of hair, 155 IQ, etc. I have great instant reads on things a lot of the time. And I like some attributes more than others, or am oddly drawn to some unexpected something. So, I hope to hear from someone, if there is someone here I am supposed to meet. I am very new here, and am happy to explore and learn with others about the area too.

title: I'll know him when I see him
text:
First of all, I'm not looking for anything serious. I'm starting over after a devastating breakup so I suppose I'm looking more for Mr Right Now than Mr Right. 
However...
Sometimes things happen organically. I won't be blind to that possibility but I'm not really looking for a ltr. 

It would be cool to find someone in a similar situation, starting over after a relationship, to just chill with and enjoy some positive interaction with the opposite sex. It doesn't have to be sexual right out the gate or it could be all about sex. Who can really say. 

About me:
I'm over 40 and so NOT a cougar. I'm a thicker woman (curvy, chubby, fat, whatever people say these days) and pretty damn secure about it so if you don't appreciate women of all sizes, I'm not for you. I'm 5'3", size 14, olive complexion, pretty face and big boobs. I love sports, am somewhat nerdy, would rather shoot pool then go to the bar, love to cook and live in flip flops or sneakers. Fairly low maintenance, or so I've been told. 
Oh...and I'm kinky. Very. 
But we'll get to that in time. 

About you:
Poly is fine but other than that I'm not interested in married men. No judgement, I'm just not into sneaking around.
I don't really have a type per se, I just know what I like: kinky, confident, assertive, nice teeth, intelligent and articulate, nice broad shoulders, taller, a gentleman in public and deviant in the bedroom, not usually attracted to gingers and I am open to all races. 

What else, what else...
Be disease free, sane, and patient! I don't care what you drive as long as you have a car but your own place would be spectacular! 

Face pics are very welcome but dick pics will put you at the end of the line. Please leave something to the imagination. :)

Looking forward to your response.
